Title: The Sixth Extinction II: Amor Fati (3)
Plot: Scully frantically searches for a way to help her ailing partner without having anyone to turn to for help, while a catatonic Mulder's dreams lead him away from his mission and the X-Files to a place which he believes is a better life.
GuestStars: Henry Schwartz, Megan Leitch, Brian George, Arlene Pileggi, Anthony Anselmi, Fritz Greve, Warren Sweeney, Andrew Cavarno, Steven Cavarno, Martin Grey, Rebecca Toolan
